itemname: Philips 32 Designed for Xbox Momentum 4K HDR display
itemdescription: The Philips Designed for Xbox Momentum display delivers a new era of optimized gaming performance leveled-up with DTS Sound enhanced audio, vibrant DisplayHDR 400, and new Ambiglow lighting technology.
Do it all with the streamlined mobile connectivity of this Full HD monitor, designed for both work and play.

Lose yourself in the picture-perfect immersion of this massive 23.8-inch canvas designed to redefine comfort, wellness, and sustainability. Play, work, or simply stare into the new definition of high definition.

Immerse yourself in the curve of this ultrawide monitor with WQHD resolution made to keep multitaskers focused at work and play. A streamlined and ergonomic design featuring an integrated KVM switch cuts the clutter while leaving you comfortable as you toggle between screens and CPUs.

The Philips Designed for Xbox Momentum display delivers a new era of optimized gaming performance leveled-up with DTS Sound enhanced audio, vibrant DisplayHDR 400, and new Ambiglow lighting technology.
